input.prompt:
[BADGE]: Simple upward chart line: 3-segment zigzag pointing up-right. Rounded ends, minimal geometry. Like stock moon chart. Centered composition.

[STYLE]: HAND-DRAWN DOODLE style, slightly imperfect strokes. MYSTICAL but PLAYFUL rune-like symbol. MAX 3 SIMPLE SHAPES: basic lines, dots, circles. ASYMETRICAL but balanced composition.

[RULES]: PURE BLACK BACKGROUND (#000000). NO gradients, NO texture, NO patterns.

NEON YELLOW monoline drawing (#FFD400 to #FFE44D).
THICK lines with ROUNDED ENDS - MS Paint brush tool style.
SOFT GLOW effect like neon chalk on blackboard.

MUST BE READABLE AT 32x32 PIXELS - minimalist, iconic, simple shapes.
CENTRED COMPOSITION, high contrast, clear silhouette.

PLAYFUL, MEME-LIKE, crypto/unicorn aesthetic.
ABSURD, KAWAII, digital vibe.

STRICTLY NO TEXT, NO LETTERS, NO NUMBERS.
NO PHOTOREALISM, NO 3D, NO DEPTH, NO PERSPECTIVE.
NO COMPLEX TEXTURES, NO SHADOWS, NO HIGHLIGHTS.

TINY RAINBOW ACCENT allowed on one detail only (max 10% of image).
RAINBOW = simple gradient (red-yellow-green-blue).

[32PX]: MUST WORK AT 32x32 PIXELS. Thick lines (2-3px). High contrast. Minimal detail.
input.negative_prompt:
text, letters, numbers, words, typography, watermark, signature, logo, brand,
photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d, render, cg, model, depth, perspective,
gradient, soft shading, glossy, lens flare, bloom heavy, blurry,
ambient occlusion, complex texture, noise, grain, film grain,
pastel, low contrast, desaturated, colorful, multicolor, rainbow,
detailed, intricate, ornate, decorative, pattern, background,
transparent, translucent, glass, crystal, shiny, reflective,
thin lines, fine details, delicate, fragile,
shadow, highlight, lighting, rim light,
busy, cluttered, messy, chaotic, crowded

photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d, render, cg, model, depth, perspective,

input.prompt:
[BADGE]: Crown made of three unicorn horns inside circle: triangles with rainbow tips. Royal degen status stamp. Centered composition.

[STYLE]: BOLD CIRCULAR OUTLINE like a stamp mark. SLIGHTLY DISTRESSED edges, energetic aura. STAMP-LIKE texture, centered within boundary. STRONG PRESENCE, seal or emblem feeling.

[RULES]: PURE BLACK BACKGROUND (#000000). NO gradients, NO texture, NO patterns.

NEON YELLOW monoline drawing (#FFD400 to #FFE44D).
THICK lines with ROUNDED ENDS - MS Paint brush tool style.
SOFT GLOW effect like neon chalk on blackboard.

MUST BE READABLE AT 32x32 PIXELS - minimalist, iconic, simple shapes.
CENTRED COMPOSITION, high contrast, clear silhouette.

PLAYFUL, MEME-LIKE, crypto/unicorn aesthetic.
ABSURD, KAWAII, digital vibe.

STRICTLY NO TEXT, NO LETTERS, NO NUMBERS.
NO PHOTOREALISM, NO 3D, NO DEPTH, NO PERSPECTIVE.
NO COMPLEX TEXTURES, NO SHADOWS, NO HIGHLIGHTS.

TINY RAINBOW ACCENT allowed on one detail only (max 10% of image).
RAINBOW = simple gradient (red-yellow-green-blue).

[32PX]: MUST WORK AT 32x32 PIXELS. Thick lines (2-3px). High contrast. Minimal detail.

NO PHOTOREALISM, NO 3D, NO DEPTH, NO PERSPECTIVE.
NO COMPLEX TEXTURES, NO SHADOWS, NO HIGHLIGHTS.

TINY RAINBOW ACCENT allowed on one detail only (max 10% of image).
RAINBOW = simple gradient (red-yellow-green-blue).

[32PX]: MUST WORK AT 32x32 PIXELS. Thick lines (2-3px). High contrast. Minimal detail.

text, letters, numbers, words, typography, watermark, signature, logo, brand,
photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d, render, cg, model, depth, perspective,

transparent, translucent, glass, crystal, shiny, reflective,
thin lines, fine details, delicate, fragile,

busy, cluttered, messy, chaotic, crowded

[RULES]: PURE BLACK BACKGROUND (#000000). NO gradients, NO texture, NO patterns.

NEON YELLOW monoline drawing (#FFD400 to #FFE44D).
THICK lines with ROUNDED ENDS - MS Paint brush tool style.
SOFT GLOW effect like neon chalk on blackboard.

MUST BE READABLE AT 32x32 PIXELS - minimalist, iconic, simple shapes.
CENTRED COMPOSITION, high contrast, clear silhouette.
